entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Image loading error #21670
  • iOS Release can't build with CosmosDB #21668
  • Style applied to a wrong element throws exception in Release but not in Debug #21661
  • Blank Space coming in top of ListView in iOS #21659
  • Cannot Build net8.0-ios via msbuild or Paired Mac #21657
  • UseInterpreter is set in any project referencing a class library that references MAUI #21653

Closed

  • In 8.0.7, Image.ToPlatform(Image.Handler.MauiContext) now gives 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.WrapperView' rather than the actual platform types (UIImageView/ImageView/Image) #21656
  • [iOS, Blazor] `AllowInlineMediaPlayback` should be true by default #16207
    Backlog
  • NavigationPage.SetTitleIconImageSource Cases crash on iOS #21518
  • Dragging random stuffs inside webview shows weird looking icon #15969
  • BlazorWebView.HostPage does not support URI pack notation #15373
  • Blazor hybrid JS initializers dont work #15201
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support transparent page background in iOS #14407
  • BlazorWebView/WebView2 Transparent background not transparent on Windows #14185
  • MAUI Blazor `html, body, #app { height: 100%; }` works properly on Windows but doesn't work properly on macOS #11508
  • Dock > Fill dropdown values missing for a BlazorWebView control #12006
  • Blazor Hybrid Relative Path Handling #10898
  • MAUI Blazor App OnBackPressed not firing after launching Modal XAML Window from Blazor #11105
  • Drag-and-drop problem #10701
  • MAUI Blazor App allow enabling WebGPU on Android/iOS/Mac #10395
  • Allow mixed-content in MauiBlazorWebView #10141
  • Updating the ItemsLayout in CollectionView on Android with ItemSizingStrategy set to MeasureFirstItem messes up Layout #21655
  • MAUI Android build crashes when app is reopened from background. It throws the exception: 'Window was already created.' #18692
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [UITEST] ScrollView Enable Legacy Tests #19051
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout initialized in code-behind does not update view layout on Android #20845
  • Scale transform seems relative instead of absolute? #21457
  • deployment errors #21652
  • Editor works perfectly in Android but generates an error in iOS #21650
  • Memory Leak on back and Fro navigation on page where Custom control and complex View Page #21404

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21667
  • [net9.0] Merge net9.0 to main #21666
  • Set Views used for CarouselView to Match Parent #21662
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658
    community ✨
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨

Merged

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • Add better exception if user opens second activity #21492
  • Don't worry about the size of the text #21628
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Updated

  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727) and make sure Android works too #21636
    area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
